00106   template<typename T>
00107   std::vector<T> parseRange(const std::string& text) {
00108     T a;
00109     T b;
00110     T c;
00111     char sep;
00112     std::vector<T> indices;
00113     std::istringstream is(text);
00114     
00115     is >> a;
00116     if (is.eof()) {
00117       indices.push_back(a);
00118       return(indices);
00119     }
00120 
00121     is >> sep >> b;
00122     if (is.fail() || sep != ':')
00123       throw(ParseError("Could not parse range " + text));
00124     
00125     if (is.eof())
00126       c = 1;
00127     else {
00128       c = b;
00129         is >> sep >> b;
00130         if (is.fail() || sep != ':')
00131           throw(ParseError("Could not parse range " + text));
00132     }
00133 
00134     // Catch a potentially sticky situation...
00135     if (a < -a && b == 0)
00136       throw(std::logic_error("Using an unsigned type with a reverse-range ending at zero."));
00137 
00138     if (b >= a)
00139       for (T i=a; i <= b; i += c)
00140         indices.push_back(i);
00141     else
00142       for (T i=a; i >= b; i -= c)
00143         indices.push_back(i);
00144 
00145     return(indices);
00146   }

00157   template<typename T>
00158   std::vector<T> parseRangeList(const std::string& text) {
00159     std::vector<std::string> terms;
00160     std::set<T> indices;
00161     std::insert_iterator< std::set<T> > ii(indices, indices.begin());
00162 
00163     boost::split(terms, text, boost::is_any_of(","), boost::token_compress_on);
00164     std::vector<std::string>::const_iterator ci;
00165     for (ci = terms.begin(); ci != terms.end(); ci++) {
00166       if (ci->empty())
00167         continue;
00168       std::vector<T> result = parseRange<T>(*ci);
00169       std::copy(result.begin(), result.end(), ii);
00170     }
00171     std::vector<T> results(indices.size());
00172     std::copy(indices.begin(), indices.end(), results.begin());
00173     return(results);
00174   }
00175

00178   std::vector<int> parseRangeList(const std::string&);

00181   template<typename T>
00182   std::vector<T> parseRangeList(const std::vector<std::string>& ranges) {
00183     std::ostringstream os;
00184     std::copy(ranges.begin(), ranges.end(), std::ostream_iterator<std::string>(os, ","));
00185       return(parseRangeList<T>(os.str()));
00186   }

00196   template<typename T>
00197   T swab(const T& datum) {
00198     uint size = sizeof(T);
00199     const unsigned char* p = reinterpret_cast<const unsigned char*>(&datum);
00200     T swabbed;
00201     unsigned char* q = reinterpret_cast<unsigned char*>(&swabbed);
00202     
00203     uint i, j;
00204     for (i=0, j=size-1; i<size; ++i, --j)
00205       q[i] = p[j];
00206     
00207     return(swabbed);
00208   }

00213   template<typename T>
00214   T parseStringAs(const std::string& source, const uint pos =0, const uint nelem =0) {
00215     T val(0);
00216 
00217     uint n = !nelem ? source.size() - pos : nelem;
00218     if (pos + n > source.size())
00219       return(val);
00220     
00221     std::string element(source.substr(pos, n));
00222     std::istringstream iss(element);
00223     if (!(iss >> val)) {
00224       std::stringstream msg;
00225       msg << "PARSE ERROR\n" << source << std::endl;
00226       for (uint i=0; i<pos; ++i)
00227         msg << ' ';
00228       msg << '^';
00229       if (n > 1)
00230         for (uint i=1; i<n; ++i)
00231           msg << '^';
00232       msg << std::endl;
00233       throw(ParseError(msg.str()));
00234     }
00235 
00236     return(val);
00237   }

00241   template<typename T>
00242   std::string fixedSizeFormat(const T t, const uint n) {
00243     std::stringstream ss;
00244     ss << t;
00245     std::string s(ss.str());
00246     uint m = s.size();
00247     if (m > n)
00248       return(s.substr(m-n, n));
00249     return(s);
00250   }
